content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. Let's begin discussing the rental price negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hope to find an affordable option here. Initially considering the desirable location and modern facilities, I might propose a starting price lower than the current market rate to initiate negotiation. 'My opening bid for this apartment is 700 Euros per month.'
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your interest but regretfully find your proposed rent too low, given the premium location and quality of the apartment. However, let's continue our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your standpoint better, I'll adjust my offer to reflect a more reasonable range. 'In light of your feedback, I'm prepared to increase my offer to 850 Euros monthly, but I still seek to negotiate further.'
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While I acknowledge your revised offer, I must emphasize that this apartment attracts significant interest due to its features and prime location. To secure it, I would need a somewhat higher rent. Let's keep negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Respecting your position and recognizing the appeal of the apartment, I am willing to make another concession. 'Taking your perspective into account, I am now offering 900 Euros a month, with the hope that we can reach an agreement.'
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Your persistence in finding a mutual agreement is admirable, but I'm afraid that 900 Euros still falls short of my expectations for this highly sought-after apartment. Let's continue to explore other options, Maryam.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective and apologize for failing to meet your expectations thus far. While I remain keen on this apartment, I must consider my budget limitations. 'In this case, I cannot go beyond 950 Euros per month. If you cannot accommodate this offer, I will need to reconsider my options.'
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your financial limitations and appreciate your continued interest in the apartment, Maryam. Unfortunately, my minimum acceptable rent for this unit remains higher than your latest proposal. At this juncture, I must decline further negotiations and wish you good luck in your search elsewhere. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
